1st step: Reading data 

1- Setting the path to the folder
It assumes that the working directory contains the folder "UCI HAR Dataset"
```{
path_to_folder <- file.path("UCI HAR Dataset")
}
```

2- Reading generic information (features and activity_labels)
```{
features <- read.table(paste(path_to_folder, "/", "features.txt", sep = ""))
activity_labels <- read.table(paste(path_to_folder, "/", "activity_labels.txt", sep = ""))
}
```
